credit_line: Gift of the National Academy of Design from the Mrs. William T. Brewster Bequest
title: Shoreline with Debris and Distant Ships
provenance: Anna Richards Brewster, Scarsdale, NY, 1905-1952; William T. Brewster,
medium: Graphite on cream wove paper, bound
description: Shoreline at right in foreground with debris on beach. Calm ocean out to horizon. On horizon, at left, a distant boat. Second boat on horizon at center.
name: Sketchbook folio
